section.p: This section contains the procedure(s) that a clinician planned based on the preoperative assessment.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-8082, CONF:1098-10436, CONF:1098-32590 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.30"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Planned Procedure Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.30)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15399)/@code="59772-4" Planned Procedure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15400, CONF:1098-32151)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8744, CONF:1098-15502)
Conforms to Planned Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.41:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Planned Procedure Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.30)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15399)/@code="59772-4" Planned Procedure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15400, CONF:1098-32151)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8084, R2.0=CONF:1098-8084)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8085, R2.0=CONF:1098-8085)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8744, CONF:1098-15502)
Conforms to Planned Procedure2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.41:2014-06-09)
